text.div:
ColorectalCancerOperationType

This is the code indicates the type of operation for the colorectal cancer.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    CodeDisplay
    235326000Right hemicolectomy
    174071004Extended right hemicolectomy
    26925005Transverse colectomy
    82619000Left hemicolectomy
    4558008Anterior resection
    265414003Abdominoperineal resection
    174059005Proctocolectomy
    307666008Total colectomy with ileorectal anastomosis
    16564004Hartmann’s procedure
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/nehta-crc-operation-type
